mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(mid, name, password, phone, address, sum, real_name, bank_password, bank_name, bank_number) VALUES(#{mid}, #{name}, #{password}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{sum}, #{real_name}, #{bank_password}, #{bank_name}, #{bank_number})

INSERT INTO single_note(snid, mid, bet_time, number, type, league, team_h, team_c, bet, score, bet_type, occasion, ior_type, ior_ratio, state, money, valid_money, win_lose) VALUES(#{snid}, #{mid}, now(), #{number}, #{type}, #{league}, #{team_h}, #{team_c}, #{bet}, #{score}, #{bet_type}, #{occasion}, #{ior_type}, #{ior_ratio}, #{state}, #{money}, #{valid_money}, #{win_lose})
INSERT INTO fund_record(frid, mid, time, number, type, money, discounts, state, remark) VALUES(#{frid}, #{mid}, now(), #{number}, #{type}, #{money}, #{discounts}, #{state}, #{remark})
mapper.update: UPDATE single_note SET state = #{state}, win_lose = #{winLose} WHERE snid = #{snid}
